q: and provocative.( David Paul Morris/Getty Images) LOS ANGELES-After three weeks in office and days filled with meetings, legislators came up with a proposal that state Treasurer Bill Lockyer calls "realistic and provocative." The plan acknowledges that a balanced remedy of spending reductions and revenues is the best cure, Bill Lockyer said in a statement. The California legislature's logjams during attempts to develop effective responses to the growing deficit had become a perennial problem since the worldwide economic meltdown began. Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand told US television Sunday she had visited Gabrielle Giffords the previous day and found her "doing great" and "making progress every day." Gabrielle Giffords is using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand told NBC's "Meet The Press" program.
